meanings.sent1: She carried a hantle of books home from the library.

meanings.sent3: The hantle of candy in the jar tempted the children.
meanings.sent4: His heart held a hantle of memories from his childhood.
meanings.sent5: The hantle of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: He needed to hantle the difficult situation with care.
